original_text: because David did what was right in the eyes of the Lord and did not turn aside from anything that he commanded him all the days of his life, except in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.
korean_text: 이는 다윗이 헷 사람 우리아의 일 외에는 평생에 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하고 자기에게 명령하신 모든 일을 어기지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: because David did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 여호와 보시기에 정직한 일을 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: and did not turn aside from anything that he commanded him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 명령한 모든 것에서 떠나지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: all the days of his life
except in the matter of Uriah the Hittite
